block.p: Hedi Tamara Katz, a daughter of Betsy Katz Oden of Hurley, N.Y., and Sherman Katz of Williston Park, N.Y., was married on Thursday to Michael Louis Rorro, the son of Dr. Gilda Rorro-Baldassari of Mercerville, N.J., and the late Dr. Louis M. Rorro. Mayor Ann McNamara of Tinton Falls, N.J., officiated outside the Twin Lights Historical Site, a 19th-century lighthouse in Highlands, N.J.

The bride, 34, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a senior director in the residential mortgage-backed securities group in New York for Fitch Inc., a bond rating agency. She graduated from Boston University and received an M.B.A. from Yale University. Her mother, who is retired, was an education evaluator for the New York City Board of Education. Her father is a computer consultant in the Garden City, N.Y., office of the Cendant Corporation, which handles franchising for Century 21, Howard Johnson and other companies.

Hedi Tamara Katz, a daughter of Betsy Katz Oden of Hurley, N.Y., and Sherman Katz of Williston Park, N.Y., was married on Thursday to Michael Louis Rorro, the son of Dr. Gilda Rorro-Baldassari of Mercerville, N.J., and the late Dr. Louis M. Rorro. Mayor Ann McNamara of Tinton Falls, N.J., officiated outside the Twin Lights Historical Site, a 19th-century lighthouse in Highlands, N.J.

The bride, 34, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a senior director in the residential mortgage-backed securities group in New York for Fitch Inc., a bond rating agency. She graduated from Boston University and received an M.B.A. from Yale University. Her mother, who is retired, was an education evaluator for the New York City Board of Education. Her father is a computer consultant in the Garden City, N.Y., office of the Cendant Corporation, which handles franchising for Century 21, Howard Johnson and other companies.

The bridegroom, 33, directs promotional films for nonprofit groups and also directs music videos in Atlantic Heights, N.J. In addition, he works as a freelancer for Miramax Films, writing synopses and comments on screenplays. A graduate of Vassar College, he received a master's degree in liberal studies from Dartmouth College and another in cinema studies from New York University. His mother, who is retired, was an assistant superintendent of human resources for the Trenton public schools. His father was a general practitioner in Mercerville. The bridegroom is the stepson of Giovanni Baldassari.
